original_text: Immediately the word was fulfilled against Nebuchadnezzar. He was driven from among men and ate grass like an ox, and his body was wet with the dew of heaven till his hair grew as long as eagles' feathers, and his nails were like birds' claws.
korean_text: 바로 그 때에 이 일이 나 느부갓네살에게 응하므로 내가 사람에게 쫓겨나서 소처럼 풀을 먹으며 몸이 하늘 이슬에 젖고 머리털이 독수리 털과 같이 자랐고 손톱은 새 발톱과 같이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: He was driven from among men
and ate grass like an ox,
and his body was wet with the dew of heaven
till his hair grew as long as eagles' feathers,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 머리털이 독수리 깃털처럼 길어질 때까지였고

sentences.original_text: and his nails were like birds' claws.
